title: Aleene's Quick Dry Tacky Glue, 4 FL OZ - 3 Pack, Multi
description: Aleene's Quick Dry Tacky Glue tacks and dries up to 50% faster than other craft glues on the market! This nontoxic formula applies white and dries clear in just 35 minutes, compared to an hour or longer for traditional white craft glues. Use it on a variety of surfaces, trusting in the superior quality and performance delivered in every adhesive from the Aleene's Tacky Glue line.
